rationale: Assessment of the risk level of this threat should be performed
the control shall be performed every 200ms
fulltext: System shall within 200 milliseconds satisfy controlCycle

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval. REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <= 200 from the trigger (i.e., at trigger, trigger+1, ..., or trigger+200). If the interval ends sooner than trigger+200, then RES need not hold.

rationale: System shall be robust against sporadic errors (e.g. invalid GPS positions, wrong heading angle)
The driving cycle shall be 9 hours
fulltext: Vehicle shall within 9 hours satisfy drivingCycleComplete

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval. REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <= 9 from the trigger (i.e., at trigger, trigger+1, ..., or trigger+9). If the interval ends sooner than trigger+9, then RES need not hold.

rationale: System shall detect and drop unwanted requests to switch to manual mode

rationale: The system shall check GPS connection before switching to parallel guidance
fulltext: when parallelGuidanceRequested System shall satisfy checkGPS -> ParallelGuidanceMode

semantics.description: ENFORCED: in the interval defined by the entire execution. TRIGGER: first point in the interval if (parallelGuidanceRequested) is true and any point in the interval where (parallelGuidanceRequested) becomes true (from false). REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some time point between (and including) the trigger and the end of the interval.
